attributes.additional_details:
The main agenda of the Great Reset is very clearly mapped out by the W.E.F
"You will own nothing and you will be happy"

We demand that Parliament debate this.
attributes.background:
We, the British public, are well aware of the plans for the UK to take part in the "Great Reset" as set out by the World Economic Forum.

We feel that the "Great Reset" is not in the interests of the general population. Therefore, we expect our Government to put measures in place to prevent it.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'. It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
